title: Embroidery Sample
description: geometric embroidery--stars and squares--red, green, tan and black bordered on three sides by embroidered floral designs--red, green, yellow machine embroidered tape on three sides; lining is red, green, black floral pattern
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
